{{Use dmy dates|date=December 2015}} {{Use Indian English|date=December 2015}} {{Infobox film | name = Newspaper Boy | image = Newspaper_Boy_1997_Film.jpg | caption = | director = [[Nissar (director)|Nissar]] | writer = | starring = {{Unbulleted list|[[Mukesh (actor)|Mukesh]]|[[Jagathy Sreekumar]] }} | producer = | music = '''Background Score:'''
Rajamani | cinematography = M.D. Sukumaran | editing = G.Murali | country = India | released = 1997 | runtime = 131 minutes | language = [[Malayalam language|Malayalam]] | budget = }} '''''Newspaper Boy''''' is a [[1997 in film|1997]] [[Cinema of Kerala|Malayalam-language]] [[Cinema of India|Indian]] [[feature film]] [[Film director|directed]] by [[Nissar (director)|Nissar]], starring [[Mukesh (actor)|Mukesh]], [[Jagathy Sreekumar]] in lead roles.{{cite web|url=http://www.malayalachalachithram.com/movie.php?i=3009|title=Newspaper Boy (1980)|publisher=malayalachalachithram.com|accessdate=2014-09-26}}{{cite web|url=http://en.msidb.org/m.php?2561|title=Newspaper Boy [1998]|publisher=en.msidb.org|accessdate=2014-09-26}} ==Cast== *[[Mukesh (actor)|Mukesh]] as Krishnankutty *[[Suma Kanakala]] as Sita *[[Jagathy Sreekumar]] as K.K. Ponnappan *[[Kalabhavan Mani]] as Pyasi *[[Kalpana (Malayalam actress)|Kalpana]] *[[Nadirsha]] as Rasheed *[[Rajan P. Dev]] as Dada *[[Cochin Haneefa]] as Jagadeeshwara Iyer *[[Zainuddin_(actor)|Zainuddin]] as Phalgunan *[[Salim Kumar]] as Venkiti *[[K.T.S. Padannayil]] as Chellappan *[[Machan Varghese]] as Pakki *[[Meghanathan]] as Viswanathan *[[Jose Pellisseri]] *[[Kanakalatha]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb title|0355823}} [[Category:1997 films]] [[Category:Indian films]] [[Category:1990s Malayalam-language films]] {{1990s-Malayalam-film-stub}}
